Action: PAGE 1 - Open access compliance
Go to the application form
Click the question mark next to the questions.
Expected Test Results:
* A pop-up help box appears
You can click the link in the help box

Action: Click close
Expected Test Results: * The pop-up box disappears

Action: Click Next
Click Yes on the first question
Expected Test Results: * The error message disappears

Action: Click No on the first question
Expected Test Results: * You see the error message: 'DOAJ only indexes open access journals which comply with the statement above. Please check and update the open access statement of your journal. You may return to this application at any time.'

Action: Click Yes on the first question
Expected Test Results: * The error message disappears

Action: Type XXX into the box for question 2
Expected Test Results: * The error message changes: 'This value should be a valid URL'

Action: Type https://doaj.org into the box
Expected Test Results: * The URL is shown underneath the box and is clickable

Action: Click Next
Expected Test Results: * An error message appears under the last questions indicating that you must answer them

Action: Type 1800
Click Next
Expected Test Results: * You see the error message: 'OA Start Date must be a year in a 4 digit format (eg. 1987) and must be bigger than 1900 but smaller than current year'

Action: Type 2100
Click Next
Expected Test Results: * You see the error message: 'OA Start Date must be a year in a 4 digit format (eg. 1987) and must be bigger than 1900 but smaller than current year'

Action: Type 1800
Click Next
Expected Test Results: * You're taken to the "About" page

Action: PAGE 2 - About
Check the application progress Menu at the right
Expected Test Results: * 1st page marked with a tick, 2nd tab marked orange as active

Action: Click on the (1) in the application progress menu
Expected Test Results: * You're taken to the first tab

Action: Create an error (eg. Change the answer to the 1st question to "No")
Click on the (2) in the application progress menu
Expected Test Results: * You're taken to the 2nd tab, 1st tab is marked red as containing invalid answers

Action: Click "Back" at the bottom of 2nd tab
Expected Test Results: * You're taken to the 1st tab

Action: Change the answer to Yes
Scroll to the bottom and click Next
Expected Test Results: * Journal Title, Link to the journal's homepage, ISSN, Keywords, Languages, Publisher's name and country - marked as required

Action: Fill in the title field and the homepage URL
In the ISSN (print) field add xxxx-xxxx
Expected Test Results: * You see the error message: 'This value seems to be invalid'

Action: Repeat in the ISSN (online) field
Expected Test Results: * You see the same error message

Action: Enter the same ISSN in both fields
Expected Test Results: * You see the error message: The value of this field and the ISSN (print) field must be different.

Action: Change the value of one ISSN
Expected Test Results: * All error messages clear.

Action: Add keywords
Expected Test Results: * As you type, you see suggestions in a list below the box

Action: Select a suggestion
Expected Test Results: * It is added to the box

Action: Add 7 keywords
Expected Test Results: * As you write the 7th keyword, you see the message: You can only select 6 items

Action: Click on the X in two keywords
Expected Test Results: * They disappear

Action: Click in the languages box
Expected Test Results: * You can start to type and suggested languages appear

Action: Select and language and then click the arrow next to it
Expected Test Results: * A dropdown list of all available languages appears.

Action: Click Add Another
Expected Test Results: * Another language field appears

Action: Click the X next to it
Expected Test Results: * It disappears

Action: Repeat steps X to X for the Publisher's Name, Country, Society name, Country
Delete the values from Society name and country, click Next
Expected Test Results: * You can submit the page without providing answers to optional questions.

Action: PAGE 3 - Copyright & licensing
Check the application progress Menu at the right
Expected Test Results: * 1st and 2nd pages marked with a tick, 3rd page is marked orange as active

Action: Select 3 of the CC licenses
Expected Test Results: * You can select multiple items

Action: With a CC license selected, choose Publisher's own license
Expected Test Results: * The CC license deselects automatically and the "attributes" choices appear.

Action: Choose some attributes and try to click on a CC license
Expected Test Results: * The checkboxes are inactive

Action: Unclick Publisher own license
Expected Test Results: * "Attributes" question disappears and you can select a CC license

Action: Embedded licences: click Yes
Expected Test Results: * The URL field appears.

Action: Click No
Expected Test Results: * The URL field disappears

Action: Scroll to the bottom and click the Previous button
Expected Test Results: * You are taken to Page 2.

Action: ClickPage 3 Copyright & licensing on the progress bar
Expected Test Results: * You are taken back to Page 3 and your answers are preserved.

Action: Complete all fields and click Next
PAGE 4 - Editorial
Click on 2 or 3 types of peer review
Expected Test Results: * You can select multiple values

Action: Click Other
Expected Test Results: * The box 'Other peer review' appears

Action: Unclick Other
Expected Test Results: * It disappears

Action: Plagiraism: click Yes
Expected Test Results: * The URL box appears

Action: Write a number in the Average weeks box,
Expected Test Results: * You can use the arrows at the side to increase or decrease the number

Action: Complete the rest of the page, click Next
PAGE 5 - Business model
APC question, click Yes
Expected Test Results: * The 'Highest APC charged' fields appear.

Action: Click No
Expected Test Results: * The boxes disappear but the URL fields remains

Action: Click Yes again and click Add Another
Expected Test Results: * A 2nd row appears. You can select different currencies and different amounts

Action: PAGE 6 - Best practice
Select one or more archiving services
Expected Test Results: * You can select more than one and the URL box appears

Action: Select 'The journal content isn't archived...' option
Expected Test Results: * The others deselect and become inactive

Action: Select Other
Expected Test Results: * Other archiving policy  and URL boxes appear

Action: Scroll to the bottom and press Next
Expected Test Results: * You see an error message telling you that the Other box must be filled in

Action: Fill in all the other questions and click Next
Expected Test Results: * You are taken to the Review page

Action: PAGE 7 - Review your answers
Note the URL under Open access compliance. Click the first 'Edit this section' box
Expected Test Results: * You are taken to Page 1 Open access compliance

Action: Change the URL and click 'Review your answers' on the progress bar
Expected Test Results: * The URL has updated.

Action: Click 'Edit this section', scroll to the bottom of the page and click Next
Expected Test Results: * You are taken to Page 2 About and all your answers are preserved

Action: Click Review your answers on the Progress bar
Expected Test Results: * You are taken back to Page 7 -  Review you answers

Action: Scroll to the bottom and click try to click Submit
Expected Test Results: * The Submit button is greyed out.

Action: Check the consent box
Expected Test Results: * The Submit button goes red

Action: Unchedck the consent box again
Expected Test Results: * The Submit button goes grey again

Action: Check the consent box and click Submit
Expected Test Results: * The application submits and you are shown the confrmation page
